name: Bubble Birds V - Shooter
description:
The best bubble shooter game in the popular Bubble Birds series. Match and pop birds, save animals! Play now for free!

Join Tom to rescue cute birds and other animals from the cages and defeat Angry Eagle in this exciting adventure!

Features:
- Over 200 bubble shooter levels with challenging obstacles!
- Regular updates with fun colorful themes
- Beautiful graphics and animations. Everything is bursting with color!
- Release the animals and birds from Angry Eagle!
- Use power ups to make smart moves
- Connect to Facebook to challenge friends
- Save your progress and sync it between devices when connected to the Internet

Like us on Facebook to get the latest news and rewards:https://www.facebook.com/bubblebirdsv/
